    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water as a conductor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser als Leiter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau comme conducteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água como um condutor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua come conduttore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ ως αγωγό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua como conductor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two diagrams showing a laboratory setup used to investigate the conducting ability of water. Here the ice cube is not wrapped with wire gauze.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen flame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction of heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Diagrammen verwendete 
das Zeigen einer Laborinstallation, die Leitfähigkeit des Wassers 
nachzuforschen. Hier wird der Eiswürfel nicht mit Leitung Gaze 
aufgewickelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux diagrammes montrer une 
installation de laboratoire étudiait les capacités de conduite de 
l'eau. Ici le cube en glace n'est pas enveloppé avec la gaze de
fil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de dois diagramas mostrar uma 
instalação do laboratório usou-se investigar a abilidade conduzindo
da água. O cubo do gelo não é envolvido aqui com gauze do 
fio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due schemi mostrare una messa
a punto del laboratorio ha usato studiare l'abilità di condotta di 
acqua. Qui il cubo del ghiaccio non è spostato con la garza del
legare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερο δύο διαγραμμάτων που εμφανίζουν εργαστηριακή 
οργάνωση που χρησιμοποιείται για να ερευνήσει τη δυνατότητα 
διεύθυνσης του ύδατος. Εδώ ο κύβος πάγου δεν είναι 
τυλιγμένος με τη γάζα καλωδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos diagramas mostrar una 
disposición del laboratorio investigaba la capacidad que conducía 
del agua. Aquí el cubo del hielo no se envuelve con gasa del 
alambre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kochendes Gefäß</string>
          </keyword>
